messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/28/01 1:38:46 AM, meghanbean@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/28/01 1:38:46 AM, meghanbean@... writes:

<< I had a go
and couldn't get anywhere with it. It would let me ADD
another address but I couldn't seem to change it. Am I
missing something? Thanks in advance for any help on
this. >>

I can change you if you want.

Let me know the old one and the new one (unless you manage to do it yourself)
and I'll just edit you within our group.

Sandra

messages.subject: change email address?
messages.msgSnippet: To anyone and everyone, I am changing my email address. I was wondering if I have to sign up again as a new member with my new email address or is there some
messages.messageBody:
To anyone and everyone,
I am changing my email address. I was wondering if I
have to sign up again as a new member with my new
email address or is there some way to change my
address in the groups management section? I had a go
and couldn't get anywhere with it. It would let me ADD
another address but I couldn't seem to change it. Am I
missing something? Thanks in advance for any help on
this.
Meghan
